content:
This is in preparation for our weekly Thursday call, 2pm ET.

After we submitted our approved Mission & Charter to ASD, @k connor wrote to us co-chairs (@Virginia Lorenzi @Debi Willis and me) suggesting two changes:

  • Explicitly call out that patient data access issues are in scope for this WG
  • Add formal relationships to Security WG and Community Based Care & Privacy.

After some consultation with mentor @Lloyd McKenzie we drafted this revision, which I'm adding to top of this week's agenda.

I'll cross-post this to the PEWG listserv.
